sentence: Israeli  media  reported  more  than  700  people  were  killed  by  Hamas.
Palestinian  health  officials  said  at  least  493  people  have  been  killed,  including  91  children  and  61  women.

In  other  areas,  the  Palestinian  Health  Ministry  said  15  Palestinians  have  been  killed  since  Saturday,  among  them  two  minors,  and  80  wounded  across  six  different  locations  in  West  Bank  and  Jerusalem.
Local  rescue  services  said  about  260  attendees  were  killed,  while  others  were  taken  hostage.
An  Egyptian  policeman  opened  fire  on  Israeli  tourists  Sunday  in  the  Mediterranean  city  of  Alexandria,  killing  at  least  two  Israelis  and  one  Egyptian,  local  media  reported.
